dataformat.name: bindyCsv
dataformat.title: Bindy CSV
dataformat.description: Marshal and unmarshal between POJOs and Comma separated values (CSV) format using Camel Bindy
dataformat.label: dataformat,transformation,csv

type.description: Whether to use Csv, Fixed, or KeyValue.

classType.description: Name of model class to use.

allowEmptyStream.description: Whether to allow empty streams in the unmarshal process. If true, no exception will be thrown when a body without records is provided.

unwrapSingleInstance.label: advanced
unwrapSingleInstance.description: When unmarshalling should a single instance be unwrapped and returned instead of wrapped in a java.util.List.

locale.label: advanced
locale.description: To configure a default locale to use, such as us for united states. To use the JVM platform default locale then use the name default
